game.name: Star and Serpent Solitaire
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Experience Klondike solitaire through classical Tarot cards. Earn gold, claim treasure, unlock Major Arcana cards and if you win... get your fortune told.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience Klondike solitaire through classical Tarot cards. Earn gold, claim treasure, unlock Major Arcana cards and if you win... get your fortune told.
